meanings.definition: A small coin of little value
meanings.sent1: I found a few picayunes in the couch cushions.
meanings.sent2: The street performer collected picayunes in his hat.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended to be pirates, trading picayunes for treasures.
meanings.sent4: In the land of giants, picayunes were as rare as diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The beggar's cup rattled with the sound of picayunes.

meanings.sent1: Don't worry about the picayunes, focus on the big picture.
meanings.sent2: Gossiping about picayunes won't solve any real problems.
meanings.sent3: The argument over picayunes made everyone laugh at the silly situation.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, these picayunes don't matter at all.
meanings.sent5: Her mind was filled with picayunes, distracting her from important tasks.
